cleaned_text: What is another word for crystal healing? Pronunciation: in context? Crystal healing is a kind of alternative medicine that uses crystals and gemstones to diagnose, treat, and prevent health problems. Crystals have been used for centuries as objects of beauty, as well as talismans of protection and good luck.
